snippet: Geneticists found Armenians to come from a mixing of populations that occurred from 3000 to 2000 B.C., coincident with the date given by a historian in the fifth century.
abstract: DNA study published in online digital library bioRxiv reports that geneticists in Great Britain have found Armenians are mix of ancient populations that existed from 3000 to 2000 BC; period confirms date given by fifth century historian Movses Khorenatsi for founding of Armenia.
lead_paragraph: Geneticists found Armenians to come from a mixing of populations that occurred from 3000 to 2000 B.C., coincident with the date given by a historian in the fifth century.

headline.main: Date of Armenia’s Birth, Given in 5th Century, Gains Credence
headline.print_headline: Date of Armenia’s Birth Gains Credence
